section.title: Board and shield sizes
section.p: Jaluino Medium board size is rather bigger than Arduino Duemilanove board. This is mainly because microntroller itself is bigger (it has more pins). Jaluino board is also single side, to be easier to build at home. Finally, Jaluino provides more features, like a serial connectorArduino only provides USB, or serial on older versions, but not both and an I²C connector.

fig.title: Jaluino Medium under construction, compared to Arduino Duemilanove.

section.p: Jaluino shield aera is smaller than the board itself, whereas Arduino's shield have quite the same size as the board.
